RegisteredCommand.label: Registered command
RegisteredCommand.tooltip: Responds with the number of registered players

NumTeamsCommand.label: NumTeams command
NumTeamsCommand.tooltip: Responds with the number of teams that can be created with the current player list with the given team size

CreateTeamsCommand.label: Create Teams command
CreateTeamsCommand.tooltip: Accepts an integer > 1 to create teams of that size

CreateTeamsPermission.label: Create Teams command Permission
CreateTeamsPermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the create teams command

CreateTeamsInfo.label: Create Teams Info (for User_Specific, Min_Rank, Min_Points, Min_Hours)
CreateTeamsInfo.tooltip: For specifying the additional value needed when User_Specific, Min_Rank, Min_Points, or Min_Hours is selected above as the create teams command permission.

MaxMMR.label: Max MMR
MaxMMR.tooltip: Blocks user from registering with an MMR greater than this value. Leave blank to allow any MMR.

AlertMMR.label: Alert MMR
AlertMMR.tooltip: If user enters an MMR greater than this value, they will be registered but it will a trigger an "@mods" message warning them that the user may be trolling. Leave blank to not alert.
